.. _class_PackedFloat32Array_method_slice:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`PackedFloat32Array<class_PackedFloat32Array>` **slice**\ (\ begin\: :ref:`int<class_int>`, end\: :ref:`int<class_int>` = 2147483647\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_PackedFloat32Array_method_slice>`

è¿”å›è¯¥ **PackedFloat32Array** çš„åˆ‡ç‰‡ï¼Œæ˜¯ä» ``begin``\ ï¼ˆå«ï¼‰åˆ° ``end``\ ï¼ˆä¸å«ï¼‰çš„å…¨æ–° **PackedFloat32Array**\ ã€‚

\ ``begin`` å’Œ ``end`` çš„ç»å¯¹å€¼ä¼šæŒ‰æ•°ç»„å¤§å°è¿›è¡Œé™åˆ¶ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ ``end`` çš„é»˜è®¤å€¼ä¼šåˆ‡åˆ°æ•°ç»„å¤§å°ä¸ºæ­¢ï¼ˆå³ ``arr.slice(1)`` æ˜¯ ``arr.slice(1, arr.size())`` çš„ç®€å†™ï¼‰ã€‚

å¦‚æœ ``begin`` æˆ– ``end`` ä¸ºè´Ÿï¼Œåˆ™è¡¨ç¤ºç›¸å¯¹äºæ•°ç»„çš„æœ«å°¾ï¼ˆå³ ``arr.slice(0, -2)`` æ˜¯ ``arr.slice(0, arr.size() - 2)`` çš„ç®€å†™ï¼‰ã€‚

.. _class_PackedFloat32Array_method_sort:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

|void| **sort**\ (\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_PackedFloat32Array_method_sort>`

å‡åºæ’åˆ—æ•°ç»„ä¸­çš„å…ƒç´ ã€‚
